attributes.action: Call for an immediate snap election.
attributes.additional_details:
The people have lost all reason to trust this government in its handling of our post-Brexit Britain, and our people are in need of new leadership that will not treat us all as collateral damage for their vanity projects.

https://news.sky.com/story/boris-johnson-defended-by-minister-over-holiday-important-pm-gets-family-time-12431258 - https://inews.co.uk/news/politics/conservatives/boris-johnson-holiday-where-costa-del-sol-marbella-villa-wife-carrie-zac-goldsmith-1242466
attributes.background: The country has reached a crisis point where our people are facing shortages of basic necessities, such as food, petrol, and other essential goods. Meanwhile, at the time of our writing this, our Prime Minister is deliberately neglecting his duties to take a holiday trip to Marbella.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: 

Hold a general election in December 2021:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/597916
